* Contact: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/FelipeLavinZ
* Make: Packard Bell
* Brand: EasyNote
* Model: 456+
* Website: <nowiki>[[http://www.packardbell.cl|Packard Bell Chile]]</nowiki>

=== Current Issues ===
* HAL won't start when concurrency=shell on /etc/init.d/rc, works normal if is set to "none"
* Audio (HDA Intel) is buggy, fixed adding '''options snd-hda-intel model=3stack''' to /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base
* Monitor reports wrong physical dimension
* Will not wake up after suspend

=== System Info ===
* Packard Bell BV

* Easy``Note_MX45

* P``B``64E02420
